00175    // Inline method definitions
00176    
00177    /* 
00178    * Return interaction energy for one bond
00179    */
00180    inline double FeneBond::energy(double rSq, int type) const
00181    {
00182      if (rSq < rlSq_[type]){     
00183        double g = 1.0 - rSq*r0SqInv_[type];
00184        return ce_[type]*log(g);
00185      } else {
00186        //double b = rl_[type]*kappa_[type]/a_[type];
00187        return energyCutoff_[type] + forceCutoff_*(sqrt(rSq) - rl_[type]);  
00188      } 
00189    }
00190 
00191    /* 
00192    * Return force / distance for one bond, for use in MD
00193    */
00194    inline 
00195    double FeneBond::forceOverR(double rSq, int type) const
00196    {
00197      if (rSq < rlSq_[type]){ 
00198        double g = 1.0 - rSq*r0SqInv_[type];
00199        return -kappa_[type]/g;
00200      } else {
00201        if (rSq > r0Sq_[type]) {
00202           std::cout << "Warning: Long FENE bond: Rsq = " << rSq << std::endl;
00203        }
00204        //return -rl_[type]*kappa_[type]/(a_[type]*sqrt(rSq));  
00205        return -forceCutoff_/sqrt(rSq);  
00206      }              
00207    }
00208 
00209 }
